description: Fully networked display and control unit in one: the Purion 200 provides compact and easy-to-read information about your speed, range and more. And, thanks to its ambient light sensor, you can quickly read the information even in bright sunshine and darkness. Located directly adjacent to your thumb on the handlebar, it lets you ergonomically and intuitively control your bikeâ€™s functions.
title: Purion 200
